snippet: Nearly a dozen people have been killed in fighting between armed gunmen and Indian security forces at the base near India’s border with Pakistan. No group has claimed responsibility for the attack yet.
abstract: Indian security forces enter second day of fighting with gunmen at Pathankot air force base in Punjab near Pakistani border; standoff has claimed lives of seven Indian personnel and four gunmen, and left about 20 wounded so far; no group has yet claimed responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: Nearly a dozen people have been killed in fighting between armed gunmen and Indian security forces at the base near India’s border with Pakistan. No group has claimed responsibility for the attack yet.

headline.main: Hunt for Gunmen Continues at Air Base Near India-Pakistan Border
headline.print_headline: Hunt for Gunmen Continues at Air Base Near India-Pakistan Border
